extracted_playbook.title: Read Microsoft's Advisory and Security Blog
extracted_playbook.description: Review Microsoft's advisory and security blog post for detailed information on the vulnerabilities and patches.

extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected Exchange Server Version
extracted_playbook.description: Determine the version of Microsoft Exchange Server in use to identify if it is vulnerable.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the Exchange Server version vulnerable?
Which Exchange Server version is in use?
Is Exchange Server 2010 updated to SP 3 or any SP 3 RU?
Is Exchange Server 2013 updated to CU 23?
Is Exchange Server 2016 updated to CU 19 or CU 18?
Is Exchange Server 2019 updated to CU 8 or CU 7?

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Security Patch
extracted_playbook.description: Apply the latest security patch for the identified Exchange Server version using administrator privileges.

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade to Required Cumulative Update
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade the Exchange Server to the required Cumulative Update before applying the security patch.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is patching not an immediate option?

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Alternative Mitigations
extracted_playbook.description: Follow alternative mitigations from Microsoft's blog on Exchange Server Vulnerabilities Mitigations as a temporary solution.

extracted_playbook.title: Restrict Untrusted Connections to Port 443
extracted_playbook.description: Limit or block external access to internet-facing Exchange Servers by restricting untrusted connections to port 443 or setting up a VPN.

extracted_playbook.title: Block External Access to OWA URL
extracted_playbook.description: Restrict external access to the Outlook Web App (OWA) URL: /owa/.

extracted_playbook.title: Block External Access to Exchange Admin Center URL
extracted_playbook.description: Restrict external access to the Exchange Admin Center (EAC) aka Exchange Control Panel (ECP) URL: /ecp/.

extracted_playbook.title: Disconnect Vulnerable Exchange Servers from the Internet
extracted_playbook.description: Disconnect vulnerable Exchange servers from the internet until a patch can be applied.
